attributes.additional_details:
There are near weekly accidents on this stretch of road and over ten deaths already this year. THe junctions are dangerous and in disrepair as is the road surface.
The road needs to be updated and repaired and something put in place to prevent more fatalities whether it's dualling, a roundabout, traffic lights, speed limit, warning signs.

Please support this cause, Too many people are being killed and having their Family's ripped apart, think about how you'd feel if it was your family.
